## About

This web page will provide metadata information about the data files
used for the course Introduction to R, databases and reproducibility for
AMR epidemiologists.

Data files:

-   gapminder_data.csv

-   gapminder_wide.csv

-   hgt_wgt.csv

-   icd10_data.csv

-   dig_health_hub_amr_v2.csv

-   additional data set

### gapminder_data.csv

This data set consists of 6 variables and 1704 data points.

The variables are: - country - year - pop - continent -lifeExp
-gdpPerCap

Data types are: text, date/time, number, text, number, number
